originalText.text: Philipp and his crew is one of the most professional vendors I have ever worked with. He was punctual, responsive, and attentive during the whole process. Also, they are extremely patient and work with you AND your budget. 2bridges Productions are worth every penny and would love to work with them again. Be smart. Hire Philipp.

originalText.text:
Thank You 2bridges video!!!  I was so thrilled with the videos that you put together for my recent shoot in Central Park.  It was so disturbing
when my pageant went from live to virtual and I was so happy that you were able to accommodate me on short notice during this pandemic.   Thank you so much Reggie!!  That speaks volumes about your company's flexibility, versatility and professionalism.  Not to mention that the film quality, color balance and editing were excellent.

I was also very impressed with your videographer, Philip Stuvecke, who performed this shoot.  He was a consummate professional wo worked tirelessly until the shoot was perfect.  Even though it was 90 degrees and we shot at the height of the day.  Needless to say, my videos were amazing!!!  Thank you so much Philip!!!

I would highly recommend 2bridges video to anyone who is looking for very high quality, excellent, professional videos!!!

originalText.text: Reggie is unique in his ability to use his storytelling skills for business marketing. He came highly recommended from a colleague who connected with him via LinkedIn. At Federated Conservationists of Westchester County (FCWC), we needed to make that leap into the world of digital and video marketing. But we didn’t know how to get started. Making this leap was not an option. We needed to connect our message to young students, adults and government organizations, like NYSERDA. Reggie came in and watched our Zoom meetings and online seminars. In just a few videos, he was able to capture our message and make it into a compelling Netflix-style, mini-documentary. We look forward to making more videos with Reggie. His storytelling and video production skills will be a great asset in our marketing strategy.---Five stars for 2Bridges Productions!

originalText.text:
When I first started to think about a YouTube channel I found this company. Unfortunately, I was not able to go through with what I originally planned, due to Covid-19. So, while being quarantined, I came up with another YouTube Channel called Granny Gems. This company was able to provide all the services I needed, from production, designing, marketing and even explaining to me the correct way to write a description in detail (I had no idea how important it was). Besides all of the skills, modern technology this company has to offer, the customer service was outstanding. I was able to get all of my questions asked timely, and I am a person who asks a lot of questions. I was given detailed explanations on things I didn't understand, with patience.

If you are thinking about a reliable, knowledgeable and most importantly a company that will bring all your ideas to life, no matter how big or small the project, 2Bridges Productions is the best for you and I highly recommend them and will be hiring them again for my next project.

Thank you all!!
